value.title: It's Called Artificial Intelligence—but What Is Intelligence?
value.excerpt: Gurgling infants might seem like no match for artificial intelligence. They are terrible at labeling images, hopeless at mining text, and awful at videogames. Then again, babies can do things beyond the reach of any AI.

images.title: It's Called Artificial Intelligence—but What Is Intelligence?

value.title: No matter how sophisticated, artificial intelligence systems still need human oversight

value.title: UPDATE 1-GM CEO calls self-driving unit layoffs 'prudent,' still sees 'huge opportunity'
